title: Acupuncture - Chinese Hospital
author: Chinese Hospital Editor
description: Acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) are good options to combine with western medicine to give you well-rounded care.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) are good options to combine with western medicine to give you well-rounded care. At East West Health Services, our mission is to create optimal wellbeing through holistic TCM services and education. Our health and wellness team includes licensed acupuncturists, herbalists and massage therapists. We also partner with a range of allopathic and complementary health practitioners, researchers, and educators to support our patients in a holistic approach to health.
